section: error.h CUBE_IDE/VGA/Core/Inc/error.h Go to the documentation of this file.1 /*******************************************************/ 12 #ifndef INC_ERROR_H_ 13 #define INC_ERROR_H_ 14 15 enum ERROR 16 { 17 NO_ERR = 0, // All errors listed 18 COMMAND_ERR, // Command errors such as 'lijn' and 'rechthoek' 19 DATA_ERR, // Data error means something in the data is wrong, such as characters which are not usable: '/', '[', '(' or '@' are some examples 20 OOB_ERR, // OOB, aka 'out of bounds', is an error which is given when pixels are outside the maximum ranges 21 COLOR_ERR // Color error means a color which is not usable, was submitted 22 }; 23 24 #endif /* INC_ERROR_H_ */
